puzzle.title: Lyrics
puzzle.hint:
The correct song lyrics are:
- "Got my first real six-string, bought it at the five and dime" - "'Scuse me, while I kiss the sky" - "Ah, ah, ah, ah, stayin' alive, stayin' alive" - "It doesn't make a difference if we make it or not" - "Then I saw her face. Now I'm a believer" - "You Catholic girls start much too late, but sooner or later it comes down to fate" - "We built this city on rock and roll" - "Might as well face it, you're addicted to love" - "The girl with kaleidoscope eyes" - "The answer, my friends, is blowin' in the wind"

The original artists for each song are:
- Bryan Adams - Jimi Hendrix - Bee Gees - Bon Jovi - The Monkees - Billy Joel - Starship - Robert Palmer - The Beatles - Bob Dylan

Use the ten-digit number shown on the sticky note to index into the names of the original artists. (For example: the first artist is "Bryan Adams," and indexing by "1" gives the letter "B.")
You should get a three-word answer.
The answer is: BIG IN JAPAN
